HERO.TITLE: PróbaPont
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Six soundproof, modern rehearsal rooms in downtown Budapest

FEATURES.TITLE: What We Offer
FEATURES.ROOMS_SPACIOUS_DESC: Rooms range from 20m² to 40m², giving you plenty of space.
FEATURES.PREMIUM_EQUIPMENT_DESC: High-quality gear available, plus extra rentals.
FEATURES.AIR_CONDITIONED_DESC: Stay cool with fully air-conditioned rooms.

ROOMS.TITLE: Our Rehearsal Rooms
ROOMS.DESCRIPTION: In our rehearsal space, musicians can enjoy 6 soundproof, modern rehearsal rooms ranging from 22 m² to 40 m². Each room is well-equipped with excellent acoustics, an air exchange system, and air conditioning in the two largest rooms to ensure maximum comfort.
ROOMS.LAST_MINUTE_DESC: Flexible with your schedule? Book a rehearsal room up to 3 hours in advance and enjoy a discounted hourly rate! Fill the gaps in our calendar and save on your practice time!
ROOMS.INDIVIDUAL_DESC: Practicing solo? Rent a rehearsal room at a discounted rate and enjoy a distraction-free environment to perfect your skills!
ROOMS.CTA: Now that you're in the mood

CONTACT.TITLE: Visit Our Rehearsal Space
CONTACT.DESC: Our entrance is through the gate next to Pepco on Nagymező street. Press the button labeled 'PróbaPont' to ring the bell.
CONTACT.PUBLIC_TRANSPORT: You can easily reach us by public transport: trams 2 and 2A, trolleybuses 70 and 78, buses 15 and 115, and the M3 metro are all just 5 minutes away from our rehearsal space.

AUTH.PHONE_INVALID: Please enter a valid phone number.
AUTH.PASSWORD_REQUIRED: Password must be at least 6 characters
AUTH.ERROR_MESSAGE: An error occurred, please try again!

ALERT.FAIL: An error occured :( Please try again later

ERRORS.EMAIL_IN_USE: This email is already in use.
ERRORS.WEAK_PASSWORD: Password should be at least 6 characters.
ERRORS.USER_NOT_FOUND: User not found. Please check your email.
ERRORS.DEFAULT: Something went wrong. Please try again.

PASSWORD_RESET.TITLE: Forgot Password
PASSWORD_RESET.DESC: Please enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
PASSWORD_RESET.SUCCESS: Password reset email sent! Please check your emails

BOOKING.TITLE: Booking
BOOKING.ORDER_DISCLAIM: You can cancel your reservation at any time up to 72 hours before the booked time. If you cancel within 72 hours, you must pay the full rental fee!

ALERT.FAIL: Booking failed :( Please try again later.
ALERT.LOGIN: Please log in to make a booking!

CONFIRM_MODAL.TITLE: Confirm Your Reservation
CONFIRM_MODAL.CONTENT: Are you sure you want to confirm your bookings? Once confirmed, you can only cancel up to 72 hours before the reserved time.
